## ConfirmDialogConfig interface

Represents a configuration object for a confirmation dialog

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConfirmDialogConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cancelCallback?](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogconfig.cancelcallback.md) | Function | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that executes if the user cancels the dialog |
|  [confirmCallback?](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogconfig.confirmcallback.md) | Function | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that executes if the user confirms the dialog |
|  [confirmText](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogconfig.confirmtext.md) | string | The text that renders on the confirm button |
|  [discardText?](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogconfig.discardtext.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The text that renders on the discard button |
|  [message?](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogconfig.message.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A more detailed message |
|  [title?](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogconfig.title.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A short and descriptive title |
